tool.name: OSMGPExport2OSM

param.name: in_osmFeatureDataset
param.dialogReference: Input feature dataset using the OpenStreetMap geodatabase scema. The feature dataset is expected to contain point, line, and polygon feature classes with the "_osm_pt", "_osm_ln", "_osm_ply" ending respectively.
param.pythonReference: Input feature dataset using the OpenStreetMap geodatabase scema. The feature dataset is expected to contain point, line, and polygon feature classes with the "_osm_pt", "_osm_ln", "_osm_ply" ending respectively.

param.name: out_osmXMLFile
param.dialogReference: Specify the export file location. Although there is no restriction the most commonly used file extension is ".osm".
param.pythonReference: Specify the export file location. Although there is no restriction the most commonly used file extension is ".osm".

tool.summary: This tool allows the user to export feature dataset using the OpenStreetMap database schema into a standalone XML file.
tool.usage: This tool allows the user to export feature dataset using the OpenStreetMap database schema into a standalone XML file.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool allows the user to export feature dataset using the OpenStreetMap database schema into a standalone XML file.
